Spears::
She nodded to Firearm. "yes please." She was in a state of shock from 
hearing about Striker.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm/Slayer::
> 
> Firearm nods, standing up. "It's allright, we'll get him back."
> 
> He looks at Spears. She was probably tired. "Do you want quarters 
> assigned to you? I think you can use some rest. You probably don't 
> remember, but you've been through alot."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> A long way away, oblivious to the fact that a femm was crying about 
> his fate, a femm that he wanted to kill, Slayer flies over the 
land, 
> looking around. He was damaged, but internal repairs were underway.
> 
> He growls, seeing a wolf running on the ground. Swooping in, he 
opens 
> fire at it, not caring that it was only a common organic wolf.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Spears::
> > 
> > She heard his words and tried to think. She remembered a few bits 
of 
> > what happened, but most of it had been erased.  
> > 
> > She spoke, but still ckoking back the tears. "I really don't 
> remember 
> > anything. I think I remember something about...about..a 
> cage..Striker 
> > was in it."  She wiped her eyes and tried to think. "I recall 
> > something about...a..bot in charge..." she shook her head and 
looked 
> > at Firearm with tears still running down her face, "That's all I 
> > know." She started to ckoke up again. "I'm s
